title: Collecting Business Monitor Statistics (LGWEBST5) - Overview
---
# Overview

This document describes the flow for collecting and storing transaction rate statistics for business event monitoring. The process prepares the transaction context, calculates elapsed intervals, queries event counters, and updates shared queues with rate statistics and summary data, refreshing every 60 seconds.
